creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: four separate horizontal images on same sheet forming a continuous landscape; blue and white mountains with greenish-blue and pale yellow sky; received mounted with L2013.104.86 and L2013.104.87
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: LLC below image, in pencil: [Mountains of Himalaya]; LRC below image, in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida]
title: Mountains of Himalaya
